pages.text: $(li)Hummingbirds are tiny passive birds that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/flower_forest)Flower Forests$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/sunflower_plains)Sunflower Plains$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l).$(br)$(li)They really love flowers and often pollinate them.$(br)$(li)You can craft a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird_feeder)Hummingbird Feeder$(/l), which will keep them from straying. It will also boost their pollination rate.
You can breed these birds giving them flowers.
